page.title: 16Stour Centre, Ashford
page.content: Ashford has a big indoor sports centre. At the Stour Centre you can do swimming, squash, badminton, Keep Fit and other sports. There is a sauna and a play centre. The Stour Centre is near the railway station and the bus station, and the town centre. It is a fairly new building. It has two swimming pools - a big one, and a little one with warm water for learners. In the Stour Centre there is a bar where anybody can go. You can sit and watch people play bowls in winter. The Stour Centre is a good place for families to go because there are lots of different things to do. You don't need to be a member to go there. Sometimes they have pop-concerts and exhibitions. There is an Ideal Home Exhibition in the summer.
